fact: India is the world's largest democracy and home to the Taj Mahal.
The U.S. has the largest economy in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest on Earth.
Germany is known for its engineering excellence and is the birthplace of the automobile.
Australia is home to animals found nowhere else, like kangaroos and koalas.
Egypt is famous for the ancient pyramids and the Great Sphinx.
Japan is known for bullet trains and advanced technology, and it has more than 5 million vending machines.
